title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2186.3 - Submission of applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2186.3 - Submission of applications

State Regulations
(a) From
time to time, and as funds become available, the agency will issue a notice of
fund availability. Application forms and instructions will be available, upon
request, at the offices of the agency and at such other locations which the
agency may designate. (b) Applications will be accepted thereafter for review and evaluation on an
ongoing basis. (c) Applications
shall be submitted in the form required by the agency and shall contain such
information as the agency shall require to determine the eligibility of the
applicant and the project and to evaluate the application in accordance with
the evaluation factors set forth herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2186.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
